title: Tribute to the late OPEC Secretary General Barkindo and welcoming of the new OPEC Secretary General Al Ghais
description: At the 31st OPEC and non-OPEC Ministerial Meeting, held via videoconference on 3 August 2022, a special tribute was paid to the late OPEC Secretary General, HE Mohammad Sanusi Barkindo, by all Heads of Delegation of participating countries in the Declaration of Cooperation (DoC) (video link attached).
